transcripts.text: The suspects you have here have been comprehensively investigated and very clear prima facie cases of kidnapping, homicide, armed robbery, and unlawful possession of weapons clearly established against them.  Amongst them are members of the gang that kidnapped three ABU students along the Abuja Cardona Expressway.  We also have the syndicate that masterminded the kidnap of an honorable lawmaker in Cardona State.  We also have the syndicate that carried out the kidnap of the Turkish national inquirer state.  We also have a group of armed robbers that operate largely in river states.  Look at these people.
He said his name is Kabiru Abdullahi.
Why are you here?

He said they kidnapped one man.  He was kidnapped along Zaria Kaduna Expressway.  He said that they conspired with him and eight others.  There are nine in number that did the kidnap operation.  And six of them, part of the kidnapping syndicate, were arrested.  He said they use AK-47 rifle.  How many guns do they have?  He said they have two arms in their syndicate.
How many people they don't kidnap before?
He said that this is the first operation he carried out with the other syndicate members.  Formerly, he is into Kato Rostele.
Tell us who owns this uniform.
He said, Buhari and other of their syndicate members that have not yet been arrested, they are the people that usually provide the uniform for them.  What is your answer to that question?
My answer to that question is that we have a lot of problems.  We have a lot of problems.  We have a lot of problems.

He said that after they collected the ransom of 10 million naira, but the syndicate members informed him that the 6 million they collected, there was a power play among them.  He said part of the ransom, 6 million, he was given the sum of 450,000 and the money was recovered by the police operatives.
Can you just tell us how they do it?  Just ask them how they do their operations.  Ask them how they do it.  Nah, we don't have time for that details.
That's okay.
That's okay.
Talk, make me hear you.
My name is Man Umar.  I'm an Indian of Soba in Katina, the United States.
How old are you?
He was arrested as a suspected kidnapper.  How old is he?  He is 30 years old now.
He was arrested as a suspected kidnapper.  He was arrested as a suspected kidnapper.

He started with stealing and later on his friend Zubairu called him.  They are doing one very big market in the region along Kaduna Abuja highway that he should meet them there.  And they were given 250,000 Naira.  They kidnap another person, which they are given the sum of 750,000 naira.  And the fourth one was that of an ABU student, two ABU students, female student, and three other men.  He is a surveillance man.  They normally do a kind of division of responsibility and they collected the sum of 5.5 million.
They used three AK-47 rifles during their own operations.  That they are having their own uniforms, they use three.  That they are having their own uniforms, they use three.
